  invisible()

options(knitr.kable.NA = "")
ezpickr::pick("Tabla cursos.xlsx")  |>
  tidyr::fill() |> 
  kable(align = "ccl",
        linesep = "",
        col.names = c("Curso", 
                      "Nivel",
                      "Justificación (a partir de su experiencia o formación académica)"),
        escape = FALSE) |> 
  kable_styling(font_size = 9, latex_options = c("hold_position")) |>
  column_spec(3, width = "40em", border_right = TRUE) |> 
  column_spec(2, width = "6em") |>
  column_spec(1, width = "7em", border_left = TRUE) |> 
  row_spec(c(2,4,6,8,10:12), hline_after = TRUE) |> 
  row_spec(11:12, background = "gray", color = "white") |>
  row_spec(13, background = "black", color = "white") |>
  row_spec(0, bold = TRUE, italic = TRUE)
